text: The 18th Orgburo of the All-Union Communist Party (Bolsheviks) was elected by the 1st Plenary Session of the 18th Central Committee, in the immediate aftermath of the 18th Congress. ==Full members== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" !
